normalized: 0:25, cordelia sector standard time.
the curtain had risen on the battle of cordelia sector with the voice of the cordelian army commander, alicia viewstroem.

name: alicia
normalized: all knights, charge!
a majestic voice.
it resonated, as if to tear apart the blackness of space.

name: alicia
normalized: drive a wedge into the retreating enemy central corps!
at the head, the eins armoured knight that alicia herself commanded.

name: alicia
normalized: come with me, all right, maya?!

name: maya
normalized: yes, hime onee-sama!
the new-type armoured knight zwei, driven by the next grand duchess, maya cordelia, who was on her first battle…

name: major picard
normalized: follow maya-sama and alicia-sama.
gallant knights of cordelia!
the corps of armoured knight nulls, which cordelia boasted of, had begun to charge towards the neo terran fleet.

name: maya
normalized: aggressors against cordelia, take this!
maya cordelia was proceeding straight ahead at maximum battle speed.
she had boldness and composure that did not befit someone's first battle.
and then, at the exact same time that they got into range of her phaser rifle, she took aim, and pulled the trigger.
a beam with power that rivalled a warship's main battery tore through the darkness of space, leaving a twirling luminescent trail.
――direct hit.
suddenly, flashes spread out along the side of a neo terran warship.
like a return gift, a bombardment of phaser beams were fired at maya's zwei.

name: maya
normalized: like that would hit me!
maya dodged them with a skillful manoeuvre.

name: alicia
normalized: maya, don't be too hasty.

name: maya
normalized: yes, hime nee-sama!

name: alicia
normalized: hmph… maya… just giving the right replies…
alicia's eins put up a barrage, covering maya's zwei.
and then, while assembling in a clever formation of three knights per ship, the 18-knight null corps was inflicting attacks on the neo terran ships one after another.
a large number of white, disc-shaped bursts of light began to shine through jet-black space.
the neo terran army could not keep up with the quick movements of the armoured knights.

name: alicia
normalized: that's strange…
the battle had started to favour cordelia.
however, alicia had realized that the neo terran fleet's counter- attacks were purely for the sake of keeping up appearances.
she could sense their intention, to pretend to helplessly flee from the armoured knights, while conversely trying to draw them into a trap.

name: major picard
normalized: alicia-sama!
their movement is strange…
a deep voice was heard, and the serious expression of major picard, who was a commanding officer, appeared on the communications monitor.
it appeared that the veteran had also noticed the strangeness of the neo terran armada.

name: alicia
normalized: it's no problem.
shall we have that hotshot neo terran woman show us her skill?
alicia made a daring smile, then stepped on the foot pedal and accelerated eins.

name: major picard
normalized: as you wish.
as if they had had the same thought, major picard and the rest of the null corps followed after her.

name: maya
normalized: ah, hime nee-sama!

name: alicia
normalized: maya, hit those guys nonstop!

name: maya
normalized: y, yes!
the armoured knight corps drew near the neo terran fleet like a meteor swarm.
in accordance with their original strategy, the central neo terran corps had started to retreat, focused around the flagship urbano miralles.

name: kiria
normalized: the onihime took the bait!
fall back, fall back!
don't get hit by the onihime!

name: operator
normalized: quick!
the vanguard corps is being encroached on!

name: kiria
normalized: which units?!

name: operator
normalized: the first platoon, at the very front!

name: kiria
normalized: it doesn't matter!
even if we sacrifice the first platoon!
all units, execute tactical manoeuvres!

name: operator
normalized: r, roger!
the neo terran fleet was throwing its battle formation slightly out of order as it retreated.
the cordelian armoured knight corps rapidly approached the rear units, three blackmore-class destroyers.
the blue armoured knight, which took the vanguard and advanced on the enemy, was eins, which alicia viewstroem drove.
several streaks of gunfire were emitted from the three destroyers, focused on eins.

name: alicia
normalized: easy!
eins's small body took a dizzying path to evade all of those rays.

name: maya
normalized: as you'd expect from hime nee-sama!

name: alicia
normalized: maya, watch closely.
for a major hit, strike like this.
alicia elegantly slipped through the gunfire as if dancing around it, and closed in on the enemy ships at maximum speed.
while taking a complex s-shaped course, she slipped into the blackmore-class destroyers' blind spot.

name: alicia
normalized: sink!
while surging past the sides of the ships, she fired her phaser rifles with precision.
the explosions didn't happen immediately.
as soon as eins had taken enough of a distance from them, three bursts of light spread out in succession.
on top of having accurately grasped the construction of the enemy ships, alicia had hit the energy storehouses and ammunitions stores.

name: alicia
normalized: i won't let neo terran worms, who would set foot in our cordelia with their shoes still on, go home alive!
」(tl: i.
e.
, rudely)
alicia made a frightening derisive smile, suitable for the nickname “onihime”, and was already heading towards her next prey.
the neo terran warships were completely unable to cope with her exceedingly quick, skillful movements.

name: operator
normalized: first platoon warship no.
2, hiramatsu: serious damage!

name: operator
normalized: first platoon warship no.
1, kihalia: communications cut off!

name: operator
normalized: message from first platoon warship no.
3, limo.
“flight impossible.
request rescue!

name: kiria
normalized: kuh?!
damn onihime…!
what a velocity!

name: operator
normalized: enemy forces splitting into two groups, rapidly advancing on second and third platoons!

name: kiria
normalized: tch!
we're still not completely ready, but it can't be helped… send a coded transmission to change course!
shift to counterattack!
0:45, cordelia sector standard time.
the circumstances of the battle changed completely.
the neo terran fleet, which had kept retreating, all simultaneously moved forward and shifted to offence.

name: kiria
normalized: the flies are in killing range!
signal to all ships.
volley the goneril anti-armoured knight phaser torpedoes!
the neo terran fleet all attacked at once.
the goneril anti-armoured knight phaser torpedoes were fired simulta- neously from the blackmore-class destroyers, which were trying to encircle the armoured knight corps.
torpedoes rained down from all directions upon the 3rd and 4th cordelian armoured knight platoons, which were sticking out slightly.

name: alicia
normalized: this was their aim, huh?
but, with mere torpedoes――

name: maya
normalized: hime nee-sama, they're…!

name: alicia
normalized: what?!
the number of torpedoes that had been fired from the enemy ships had suddenly increased by several dozen times as alicia watched.
instantly, the radar monitor was blanketed by torpedoes, as if they had spewed out stardust.

name: null pilot
normalized: a new model of enemy torpedo?!
the goneril anti-armoured knight phaser torpedoes.
after they had drawn near the armoured knights at high speed, at a range of several hundred metres, they split apart into dozens of small warheads, and made attacks from every direction.

name: null pilot
normalized: kuh, can't escape?!

name: null pilot
normalized: no way, this is, uwah, waah!
the 3rd and 4th armoured knight platoons were subjected to attacks from gonerils, which had broken apart.
no matter how much it was said that the armoured knights boasted manoeuvrability, they could not avoid all of the small torpedo warheads, which came to attack them from all directions simultaneously.
finally, having received a direct hit to the back, which was not covered in uranos alloy armour, one, then two knights' bodies exploded.
becoming masses of the distinctive pure-white light of a nuclear fusion reactor, the armoured knights, which boasted of invincibility, were being scattered across space.

name: maya
normalized: hi, hime nee-sama, aah, that's…!

name: alicia
normalized: don't panic, maya!

name: maya
normalized: b, but… ah, again!

name: alicia
normalized: this is war.

name: maya
normalized: this is war…
alicia reprimanded maya, who could not conceal her unrest at the deaths of her allies.

name: alicia
normalized: 3rd and 4th platoons: report damage!
though alicia herself was astonished by the neo terras' new weapon, she gave directions to her subordinates calmly, without saying a word about it.

name: alicia
normalized: there are a lot of them, but they're just pebbles of gravel.
don't think of trying to avoid everything.
form a circle, while protecting each other's armour!

name: operator
normalized: the enemy units are crowding together.
without even having to wait for the operator's report, kiria already knew that the enemy had gone on the defensive.

name: kiria
normalized: look!
the enemy has gone on the defensive, in the face of the new weapons of the great neo terras!

name: kiria
normalized: after this, they're already rats in a trap.
surround the enemy and slowly squeeze them to death!
continuous goneril barrage!
kiria gave an order to the armada with a gleeful expression.

name: alicia
normalized: so you've taken advantage of your momentum to attack us, huh, neo terras?!
the new-type torpedoes rushed toward the armoured knight corps, which had taken a close formation, one by one.
the mass-produced nulls were only covered by uranos alloy armour on their fronts.
as the armoured knight corps adopted a circular formation to protect each other's backs, which were their weak points, they were staving off a hail of torpedo attacks that rained down upon them.
but even so, that was not something they could keep withstanding forever.
even their barrage of phaser rifles couldn't intercept all of the torpedoes, which broke apart and attacked from all directions.
they weren't lethal, but the repeated small-scale explosions were definitely chipping away at their armour.

name: maya
normalized: hime nee-sama, at this rate…

name: alicia
normalized: don't panic, maya.
in battle, there's something called chance.
picard, report the situation!

name: major picard
normalized: hah, 3rd and 4th platoons: 3 nulls seriously damaged.
remaining 3 being shot―damage superficial.

name: major picard
normalized: they have incorporated into the 1st and 2nd platoons, and adjusted their positions.
however, the enemy fleet is in the process of surrounding us.

name: maya
normalized: hime nee-sama!

name: alicia
normalized: hahaha!
looks like the enemy aren't incapable either.
alicia laughed fearlessly, like a valkyrie, and

name: alicia
normalized: inform all troops!
at my signal, strike the first besieging group on the right flank, in a convex formation!
i will cut through the front enemy group!
don't fall behind!

name: null pilot
normalized: yes!
aye, ma'am!
the subordinates replied to the onihime's orders.
there was no hint of unease in their voices.
after all, they had overcome dilemmas, escaped from the verge of death, and seized glory together with this invincible onihime.

name: major picard
normalized: well then, i'll serve as rear guard.

name: alicia
normalized: i'll leave it to you.

name: major picard
normalized: yes!
aye, ma'am!
michael, logs, come!

name: michael ＆ logs
normalized: 「yes!
second lieutenant michael and second lieutenant logs responded proudly.
they were both veteran pilots.
reliable, tenacious, and better at defence than offence, they had been thrown into key situations in battles many times.

name: maya
normalized: please wait!
hime nee-sama!
then, maya determinedly objected.
having found her mission, a serious look had appeared on her face.

name: alicia
normalized: maya?!
alicia opened her eyes wide at maya's expression.

name: maya
normalized: i've heard that the zwei i'm riding was developed for times like this.

name: maya
normalized: if hime nee-sama can take the front, then i'll be the vanguard against the enemy pursuit!
that's my job!

name: alicia
normalized: …maya…
fierce eyes that would not let her say no.
immediately, the figure of the late grand duke of cordelia was resurrected in alicia's mind.

name: maya
normalized: hime nee-sama!
i am to become grand duchess of cordelia!
i'll be scolded by my late father if i hide behind my subordinates' backs on the field of battle!

name: alicia
normalized: maya!
you're…

name: maya
normalized: scold me afterwards.
see you later, hime nee-sama!
go, my zwei!
maya announced, and her zwei shot like a meteor toward the enemies at the rear.

name: alicia
normalized: maya!

name: major picard
normalized: alicia-sama, i will back maya-sama up.
don't worry.

name: alicia
normalized: i'll leave it to you!
now, all units, follow me!
alicia signalled again.
there was no longer any doubt in her.

name: alicia
normalized: i will break through!
the battle of cordelia sector was finally about to reach its climax.
